name: Product & Service Names
description: Create compelling names and copy for products, services, features, and benefits

questions.question: What are you naming?
questions.description: Different naming types require different approaches

questions.question: What category does this belong to?
questions.description: The category helps determine appropriate naming conventions

questions.question: What's the core concept or main benefit?
questions.description: Describe the primary value or main idea behind what you're naming

questions.question: Who is your target audience?
questions.description: Choose from common audiences or enter your own custom audience

questions.question: What naming style do you prefer?
questions.description: Different styles convey different messages and feelings

questions.question: What personality should the name convey?
questions.description: The personality should align with your brand values

questions.question: Do you have a length preference?
questions.description: Consider where the name will be used and displayed

questions.question: How many variations would you like?
questions.description: Choose how many different versions of your prompt to generate (3-20)

templates.name: Product Naming
templates.description: Create compelling names for products and services
templates.template: Create a {brand_personality} {naming_style} name for a {naming_type} in the {product_category} category. The name should convey the core concept of {core_concept}. Target audience: {target_audience}. {length_instruction}. {variations_instruction}

examples.output: Create an innovative creative name for a product name in the technology/software category. The name should convey the core concept of streamlined project management. Target audience: business professionals. Keep it short and memorable

examples.title: Product Name
examples.description: Creative product name for a tech tool
examples.prompt: Create an innovative creative name for a product name in the technology/software category. The name should convey the core concept of streamlined project management. Target audience: business professionals. Keep it short and memorable.

examples.title: Service Name
examples.prompt: Create a professional trustworthy name for a service name in the professional services category. The name should convey the core concept of strategic business consulting. Target audience: business leaders. Keep it professional and credible.

examples.title: Feature Name
examples.prompt: Create a friendly approachable name for a feature name in the technology/software category. The name should convey the core concept of smart task prioritization. Target audience: busy professionals. Keep it simple and intuitive.
